cast.name: 蒂塔·万·提斯 Dita Von Teese

director.name: 索尼娅·安德森 Sonia Anderson

introduction: NTSC/Region 0. This film is a fascinating account of how Brian Warner of small-town Ohio, became the spokesman for the disgruntled and disposable generation. As the self proclaimed 'Antichrist Superstar', Marilyn Manson became one of the most controversial and notorious stars of the 1990's. His shocking performances featuring fetish, horror and Satanism, took him to the top of the charts and sold out tours. Manson takes us on a compelling journey, with his views of sex, drugs and Rock 'N' Roll. This unique film features two very rarely seen videos including 'Son Of Sam'. It features Marilyn Manson and the Spooky Kids performing live. The Spooky Kids featured Manson, Daisy Berkowitz, Madonna Wayne Gacy and Gidget Gein, stage names that combined glamorous film icons and serial killers. Entertain Me.
